sn12.55:1.2: “Upadaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assadanupassino viharato tanha pavaddhati.
sn12.55:2.2: Tassa yani ceva mulani adhogamani, yani ca tiriyangamani, sabbani tani uddham ojam abhiharanti.
sn12.55:2.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, maharukkho tadaharo tadupadano ciram dighamaddhanam tittheyya.
sn12.55:2.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upadaniyesu dhammesu assadanupassino viharato tanha pavaddhati.
sn12.55:3.1: Upadaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato tanha nirujjhati.
sn12.55:4.3: So tam rukkham mule chindeyya, mulam chinditva palikhaneyya, palikhanitva mulani uddhareyya antamaso usiranalimattanipi.
sn12.55:4.4: So tam rukkham khandakhandikam chindeyya, khandakhandikam chinditva phaleyya, phaletva sakalikam sakalikam kareyya, sakalikam sakalikam karitva vatatape visoseyya;
sn12.55:4.5: vatatape visosetva aggina daheyya, aggina dahetva masim kareyya, masim karitva mahavate va ophuneyya nadiya va sighasotaya pavaheyya.
sn12.55:4.6: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, maharukkho ucchinnamulo assa talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
sn12.55:4.7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upadaniyesu dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato tanha nirujjhati.
